Burn.name: Burn
description: Inflicts 1/16 damage to Pokemon every turn
Halves Attack (unless Pokemon has Guts or uses Facade)

Freeze.name: Freeze
description: Inflicts 1/16 damage to Pokémon every turn (1/8 in Hail, and 1/32 if the Pokémon has the Thick Fat Ability)

Paralysis.name: Paralysis
description: 25% of not moving every turn (unless Pokemon has magic guard)

Poison.name: Poison
description: Inflicts 1/8 damage to Pokemon every turn
Steel and Poison Pokemon can't be poisoned

Badly Poison.name: Badly Poison
description: Inflicts damage that doubles every turn
Damage resets if user Switches Out

Sleep.name: Sleep
description: Prevents movement for 1 - 3 turns (including initial turn)
